wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Harold Read FRS, FRSE, FGS, (17 December 1889, in Whitstable – 29 March 1970) was a British geologist  and Professor of Geology at Imperial College. From 1947-1948 he was president of the Geological Society.

response: * Herbert Harold Read, British geologist who performed much work on the origins of granite. Geological Society Wollaston Medallist.
